title: Log Delete Query Processor custom Solr component
description:
Added a Log Delete Query Processor custom Solr component (https://github.com/apache/lucene-solr/pull/483) :

	Its mainly used to identify the delete queries and log them separately to identify the delete queries performed.
	It helps to maintain track of any deletes going on in Solr.
